column1: #Text=Why get into a cab with an actual licensed and insured driver, when you can get into a private car, driven by someone without a background check, with only the minimum insurance, and at best, a sketchy knowledge of where to go, or a out of date GPS.
#Text=How about Uber lawyers, Uber Doctors, Uber Pharmacists, etc.
#Text=Why have regulated pricing, when the market can decide!
